title: Open Market
desc:
Post 1715
**Any player may choose to spend their turn to pay 1 ðŸ’µ in order to buy any card in the Discard Pile.**
_ _
**Doing so removes it from the Discard Pile, adds it to your hand, and attaches the Ethereal modifier to it.**
_ _
**Cards of colors that can only exist once per game, like <:holy:1120560132150022184> or <:rulebreaker:1120899966555127899>, cannot be bought.**
